algorithm_technique: Iterate through the string, using a hash set to track seen characters. Return the first character found again.
problem_summary_simple: Find the first character that appears for the second time in a string.
problem_summary_technical: Utilizes a hash set for O(1) average time lookups to detect the first repeated character in a string.
key_insights: A hash set (or frequency map) is efficient for tracking seen characters.
The problem asks for the *first* character to appear twice, so early exit is key.
The constraint of lowercase English letters means the set size is bounded.
